content: Select next item to the left

comment.text: This translation key is used for the "Select next item to the left" button label in the HotkeysPanel component. It appears as a hotkey button that allows users to navigate to the previous item in a list or selection.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Soldakı növbəti elementi seçin' while technically accurate, doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Select next item to the left'. It's a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would improve user experience.

The translation 'Ընտրել հաջորդ միավորը ձախ կողմում' doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'Select next item to the left'. ' միավորը' (miamvory) translates to 'item' but implies a unit or measure, rather than a selectable option. A more suitable term would better reflect the context of hotkeys.
The translation includes "(左)" which may be unnecessary and disruptive to the flow in the UI. Consider integrating 'left' into the verb or using a more natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 次のアイテムを左に選択

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Выделить следующий объект слева' doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Select next item to the left'. 'Выделить' means 'to highlight' or 'to select for highlighting', which is a specific type of selection. 'Select' is more general. A better translation would convey the general action of selecting.

The translation 'වම් පස ඊළඟ අථකය තෝරන්න' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'Select next item to the left'. 'අථකය' (athakaya) refers to 'object' or 'matter', which is not appropriate in this context. It seems to be a misunderstanding of the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: වම් පැත්තේ nächste අයිතමය තෝරන්න (Vam paththe next item thora nna) - This translates to 'Select the next item to the left'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Izberi naslednji predmet levo' is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Select next item to the left' in a user interface context.  'Predmet' is too general.  A better term would reflect a selectable option or control.
While grammatically correct, the phrase 'Izberi element levo' flows better in Slovenian in a UI context. The direct translation feels a bit clunky.

The translation 'Одабери следећу ставку са леве стране' is a literal translation, but 'item' (stavku) doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'next selection' in a hotkey context. It sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'избери следећи елемент лево' or 'изабери следећи елемент лево'.

The translation "Odaberi sledeću stavku sa leve strane" is not the most accurate or natural way to express 'Select next item to the left' in Serbian. 'Stavka' refers to an item in a list or menu, which might not be the intended meaning.  'Odaberi' is also a bit formal for a hotkey label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Izaberi sledeću opciju levo' or 'Izaberi sledeću tačku levo'. 'Izaberi' is a more common and appropriate verb for a hotkey context, and 'opcija' or 'tačka' are better choices for 'item'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Sıradaki öğeyi sola doğru seç' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Turkish for this context. It emphasizes the 'to the left' part which isn't the primary focus. A more natural phrasing would be more concise and focused on the action of selecting the left item.

The translation '向左选择下一个项目' is a literal translation, but it doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Select next item to the left' in a UI context. It sounds somewhat formal and not as natural as it could be.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑更自然的表达，例如'选择左侧项目' 或 '选择左边项目'。
